scalar:array.comment: /* * 2007-2013 PrestaShop * * NOTICE OF LICENSE * * This source file is subject to the Open Software License (OSL 3.0) * that is bundled with this package in the file LICENSE.txt. * It is also available through the world-wide-web at this URL: * http://opensource.org/licenses/osl-3.0.php * If you did not receive a copy of the license and are unable to * obtain it through the world-wide-web, please send an email * to license@prestashop.com so we can send you a copy immediately. * * DISCLAIMER * * Do not edit or add to this file if you wish to upgrade PrestaShop to newer * versions in the future. If you wish to customize PrestaShop for your * needs please refer to http://www.prestashop.com for more information. * * @author PrestaShop SA <contact@prestashop.com> * @copyright 2007-2013 PrestaShop SA * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/osl-3.0.php Open Software License (OSL 3.0) * International Registered Trademark & Property of PrestaShop SA */
/** * Random password generator * * @param integer $length Desired length (optional) * @param string $flag Output type (NUMERIC, ALPHANUMERIC, NO_NUMERIC) * @return string Password */

/** * Redirect user to another page * * @param string $url Desired URL * @param string $baseUri Base URI (optional) * @param Link $link * @param string|array $headers A list of headers to send before redirection */
// don't use ssl if url is home page
// don't use ssl if url is home page
/** * Redirect URLs already containing PS_BASE_URI * * @param string $url Desired URL */
/** * Redirect user to another admin page * * @param string $url Desired URL */
/** * getShopProtocol return the available protocol for the current shop in use * SSL if Configuration is set on and available for the server * @static * @return String */
/** * getProtocol return the set protocol according to configuration (http[s]) * @param bool $use_ssl true if require ssl * @return String (http|https) */

/** * getHttpHost return the current host used, with the protocol (http or https) if $http is true * This function should not be used to choose http or https domain name. * Use Tools::getShopDomain() or Tools::getShopDomainSsl instead * * @param boolean $http * @param boolean $entities * @return string host */

/** * getShopDomain returns domain name according to configuration and ignoring ssl * * @param boolean $http if true, return domain name with protocol * @param boolean $entities if true, * @return string domain */

/** * getShopDomainSsl returns domain name according to configuration and depending on ssl activation * * @param boolean $http if true, return domain name with protocol * @param boolean $entities if true, * @return string domain */
/** * Get the server variable SERVER_NAME * * @return string server name */
/** * Get the server variable REMOTE_ADDR, or the first ip of HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR (when using proxy) * * @return string $remote_addr ip of client */
// This condition is necessary when using CDN, don't remove it.
/** * Check if the current page use SSL connection on not * * @return bool uses SSL */
// $_SERVER['SSL'] exists only in some specific configuration
// $_SERVER['REDIRECT_HTTPS'] exists only in some specific configuration
/** * Get the current url prefix protocol (https/http) * * @return string protocol */
/** * Secure an URL referrer * * @param string $referrer URL referrer * @return string secured referrer */
/** * Get a value from $_POST / $_GET * if unavailable, take a default value * * @param string $key Value key * @param mixed $default_value (optional) * @return mixed Value */
/** * Change language in cookie while clicking on a flag * * @return string iso code */
/* If language does not exist or is disabled, erase it */
/* Automatically detect language if not already defined, detect_language is set in Cookie::update */
/* If language file not present, you must use default language file */
// Install call the dispatcher and so the switchLanguage
// Stop this method by checking the cookie
// update language only if new id is different from old id
// update language only if new id is different from old id
/** * Set cookie currency from POST or default currency * * @return Currency object */

/** * Return price with currency sign for a given product * * @param float $price Product price * @param object $currency Current currency (object, id_currency, NULL => context currency) * @return string Price correctly formated (sign, decimal separator...) */
// if you modified this function, don't forget to modify the Javascript function formatCurrency (in tools.js)

/* * If the language is RTL and the selected currency format contains spaces as thousands separator * then the number will be printed in reverse since the space is interpreted as separating words. * To avoid this we replace the currency format containing a space with the one containing a comma (,) as thousand * separator when the language is RTL. * * TODO: This is not ideal, a currency format should probably be tied to a language, not to a currency. */
/* 0'000.00 X Added for the switzerland currency */

/** * Return price converted * * @param float $price Product price * @param object $currency Current currency object * @param boolean $to_currency convert to currency or from currency to default currency */

/** * * Convert amount from a currency to an other currency automatically * @param float $amount * @param Currency $currency_from if null we used the default currency * @param Currency $currency_to if null we used the default currency */
// Convert amount to default currency (using the old currency rate)
// Convert amount to default currency (using the old currency rate)
/** * Display date regarding to language preferences * * @param array $params Date, format... * @param object $smarty Smarty object for language preferences * @return string Date */

/** * Display date regarding to language preferences * * @param string $date Date to display format UNIX * @param integer $id_lang Language id DEPRECATED * @param boolean $full With time or not (optional) * @param string $separator DEPRECATED * @return string Date */
/** * Sanitize a string * * @param string $string String to sanitize * @param boolean $full String contains HTML or not (optional) * @return string Sanitized string */
/** * Delete directory and subdirectories * * @param string $dirname Directory name */
/** * Display an error according to an error code * * @param string $string Error message * @param boolean $htmlentities By default at true for parsing error message with htmlentities */
/** * Display an error with detailed object * * @param mixed $object * @param boolean $kill * @return $object if $kill = false; */
/** * Display a var dump in firebug console * * @param object $object Object to display */
/** * ALIAS OF dieObject() - Display an error with detailed object * * @param object $object Object to display */
/** * ALIAS OF dieObject() - Display an error with detailed object but don't stop the execution * * @param object $object Object to display */
/** * Check if submit has been posted * * @param string $submit submit name */
/** * Encrypt password * * @param string $passwd String to encrypt */
/** * Get token to prevent CSRF * * @param string $token token to encrypt */
/** * Tokenize a string * * @param string $string string to encript */

/** * Get the user's journey * * @param integer $id_category Category ID * @param string $path Path end * @param boolean $linkOntheLastItem Put or not a link on the current category * @param string [optionnal] $categoryType defined what type of categories is used (products or cms) */
/** * Return the friendly url from the provided string * * @param string $str * @param bool $utf8_decode (deprecated) * @return string */
/** * Return a friendly url made from the provided string * If the mbstring library is available, the output is the same as the js function of the same name * * @param string $str * @return string */
// If it was not possible to lowercase the string with mb_strtolower, we do it after the transformations.
// This way we lose fewer special chars.
/** * Replace all accented chars by their equivalent non accented chars. * * @param string $str * @return string */
/* One source among others: http://www.tachyonsoft.com/uc0000.htm http://www.tachyonsoft.com/uc0001.htm */
/* One source among others: http://www.tachyonsoft.com/uc0000.htm http://www.tachyonsoft.com/uc0001.htm */
/** * Truncate strings * * @param string $str * @param integer $max_length Max length * @param string $suffix Suffix optional * @return string $str truncated */
/* CAUTION : Use it only on module hookEvents. ** For other purposes use the smarty function instead */

/** * Generate date form * * @param integer $year Year to select * @param integer $month Month to select * @param integer $day Day to select * @return array $tab html data with 3 cells :['days'], ['months'], ['years'] * */

/** * returns the rounded value of $value to specified precision, according to your configuration; * * @note : PHP 5.3.0 introduce a 3rd parameter mode in round function * * @param float $value * @param int $precision * @return float */
/** * returns the rounded value down of $value to specified precision * * @param float $value * @param int $precision * @return float */
// If the current value has already the desired precision
/** * returns the rounded value up of $value to specified precision * * @param float $value * @param int $precision * @return float */
// If the current value has already the desired precision
/** * file_exists() wrapper with cache to speedup performance * * @param string $filename File name * @return boolean Cached result of file_exists($filename) */
/** * Translates a string with underscores into camel case (e.g. first_name -> firstName) * @prototype string public static function toCamelCase(string $str[, bool $capitalise_first_char = false]) */
/** * Transform a CamelCase string to underscore_case string * * @param string $string * @return string */
/** * addJS load a javascript file in the header * * @deprecated as of 1.5 use FrontController->addJS() * @param mixed $js_uri * @return void */

<IfModule mod_expires.c> ExpiresActive On ExpiresByType image/gif "access plus 1 month" ExpiresByType image/jpeg "access plus 1 month" ExpiresByType image/png "access plus 1 month" ExpiresByType text/css "access plus 1 week" ExpiresByType text/javascript "access plus 1 week" ExpiresByType application/javascript "access plus 1 week" ExpiresByType application/x-javascript "access plus 1 week" ExpiresByType image/x-icon "access plus 1 year" </IfModule>
FileETag INode MTime Size <IfModule mod_deflate.c> <IfModule mod_filter.c> AddOutputFilterByType DEFLATE text/html text/css text/javascript application/javascript application/x-javascript </IfModule> </IfModule>

/** * Get products order field name for queries. * * @param string $type by|way * @param string $value If no index given, use default order from admin -> pref -> products * @param bool|\bool(false)|string $prefix * * @return string Order by sql clause */

/** * Concat $begin and $end, add ? or & between strings * * @since 1.5.0 * @param string $begin * @param string $end * @return string */
/** * Display error and dies or silently log the error. * * @param string $msg * @param bool $die * @return bool success of logging */

/** * Convert \n and \r\n and \r to
* * @param string $string String to transform * @return string New string */
/** * getMemoryLimit allow to get the memory limit in octet * * @since 1.4.5.0 * @return int the memory limit value in octet */
/** * getOctet allow to gets the value of a configuration option in octet * * @since 1.5.0 * @return int the value of a configuration option in octet */
/** * * @return bool true if the server use 64bit arch */
/** * * @return bool true if php-cli is used */

With CGI mod, we cannot get php modules * * @param string $name module name * @return boolean true if exists * @since 1.4.5.0 */

/** * Reproduce array_unique working before php version 5.2.9 * @param array $array * @return array */
